text.english: Teorema: \(\texttt{add}\) of an \(\mathcal{N}Term\) and the succesor of another \(\mathcal{N}Term\) equals the successor of the sum of the two \(\mathcal{N}Term), i.e. \[ \forall n \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{add}(n, S(m)) = S(add(n,m)) \]
text.italiano: Teorema: \(\texttt{add}\) di un qualsiasi \(\mathcal{N}Term\) e il succesore di un'altro \(\mathcal{N}Term\) equivale al succesore della somma dei due \(\mathcal{N}Term), i.e. \[ \forall n \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{add}(n, S(m)) = S(add(n,m)) \]

theorem.coq: Theorem add_succ: forall n m : nterm , add n (S m) = S (add n m).
